bibl.title: Newly Discovered Sites in the Eastern Desert.
bibl.note: Sites on the Abu-Sha'ar. - Nile Road. - Mining and Quarrying Sites. - Pp. 190-192: Latin dedication in honor of Trajan, naming the procurator Flavius Diadumenus and Flavius Fortunatus, his cliens. Fatireh el-Beida (south-west of Mons Claudianus), A.D. 103-104.
bibl.seg: SIDEBOTHAM Steven E., Newly Discovered Sites in the Eastern Desert.
JEA 82 (1996) pp. 181-192, 2 tabl., 1 carte, 1 plan et pll. XVI-XIX.

Sites on the Abu-Sha'ar. - Nile Road. - Mining and Quarrying Sites. - Pp. 190-192: Latin dedication in honor of Trajan, naming the procurator Flavius Diadumenus and Flavius Fortunatus, his cliens. Fatireh el-Beida (south-west of Mons Claudianus), A.D. 103-104.
